column4: Hi. Can someone tell me why "tunefs -U <guid> /dev/sdc1" works for EXT4 partitions, but not FAT partitions ? I get the following error: "Bad magic number in super block whyle trying to open /dev/sdc2" and "Couldn't find valid filesystem super block"
if you read the man page "tune2fs allows the system administrator to adjust various tunable filesystem parameters on  Linux  ext2,  ext3,  or ext4  filesystems."
